title: Motor Cities National Heritage Area: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Motor Cities National Heritage Area covers 16 of the more heavily populated counties of Michigan, including the Detroit area.  Use caution and watch for traffic while traveling between sites. For more safety information related to individual sites, contact them directly using information from this page.  http://www.motorcities.org/Explore+Motorcities/Pick+a+Place-7.html
